original_text: When David had passed beyond the top of the Mount of Olives, he met Mephibosheth's servant Ziba. Ziba was waiting there for him with two donkeys. The donkeys were ready for people to ride them. They also carried 200 loaves of bread, 100 blocks of raisins, 100 blocks of figs and a leather bag of wine.
korean_text: 다윗이 마루턱을 조금 지나니 므비보셋의 종 시바가 안장 지운 두 나귀에 떡 이백 개와 건포도 백 송이와 여름 과일 백 개와 포도주 한 가죽부대를 싣고 다윗을 맞는지라

sentences.original_text: When David had passed beyond the top of the Mount of Olives
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗이 올리브 산 꼭대기를 넘어섰을 때

sentences.original_text: Ziba was waiting there for him
sentences.korean_translation: 시바는 그를 위해 그곳에서 기다리고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: The donkeys were ready for people to ride them
sentences.korean_translation: 나귀들은 사람들이 탈 준비가 되어 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: They also carried 200 loaves of bread
and a leather bag of wine
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 가죽 주머니에 담긴 포도주 한 통
